timeline.speaker: A
timeline.camera: Over shoulder shot, POV scope view
timeline.visual_description: A young Asian man with GAMING HEADSET and black long-sleeve shirt crouches behind cover, holding a sniper rifle. He aims through the scope and fires confidently. The shot hits the distant enemy instantly. He smirks with satisfaction, his MOUTH OPENS TO SPEAK with bravado. The mint-green cube robot stands beside him, completely STILL and SILENT.
